articles.title: Israel Hamas war: EU sets 24-hour deadline for Facebook and Instagram to remove pro-Hamas content - Times of India
articles.description: European Union has set a 24-hour deadline for Facebook and Instagram parent Meta to remove pro-Hamas content across its platforms. European Commissioner Thierry Breton, in a letter to Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, has asked Facebook and Instagram to “be
